name: The Alternate Route
description:
Description This game is a short 2D Platformer with several pitfalls and deadly challenges all to reach a exit. What meaning do those open areas have besides death? Another route in the level awaits down there only at the cost of a life. Beat 2 Levels before you lose all your lives. 
Credits All Assets by GoldieBP
Music from ZaneLittle's A Bag of Chips
